alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard, east central Orange and south central Volusia Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Christmas, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Wedgefield, Christmas, Bithlo and Chuluota. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Orange; Seminole
